Newsletter

Newsletter June 2015

Ms. Edith Wu, our music teacher, will have a short stay in HK from 20 Sept to 3 Oct. Ms. Wu will be available on 27 September 2012 (Thursday) for dinner with us.

Some of our alumni would like to hold a party for her as she is already 86 years old. Target 10 tables. Please spread...

Details
